Package com.apgar.common.lib.utils

package com.apgar.common.lib.utils
Provides common utilities for datasets, user services, workflows, validation, tracking information, and module loaders.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatasetUtils
    Utility class for handling datasets
    ModulesClassLoadersUtils
    Utility class for managing and retrieving class loaders for modules.
    TrackingInfoUtils
    Utility class providing methods to retrieve several attributes of a record from the tracking info.
    UserServiceUtils
    Utility class providing methods for displaying loading indicators, error messages, and managing user service interactions in a web interface.
    ValidationUtils
    Utility class that offers methods for checking validation errors for records across various inputs, including tables, datasets, and dataspaces.
    WorkflowUtils
    Workflow Utility class
